thread.title: The world’s most expensive home is now up for grabs (21 HQ Photos)
thread.title_full: The world’s most expensive home is now up for grabs (21 HQ Photos)

author: Shelbie
title: The world’s most expensive home is now up for grabs (21 HQ Photos)
text:
Lots of artistically-displayed chrome-plated guns. 10 
The “lounge area” makes you feel like a celebrity with its velvet ropes roping the couches off from the rest of the room. Advertisement Advertisement 11 
Pop-up screens are all over the place, including outside. That way you don’t have to miss the big game while you’re checking out that sunset. 12 
If you’d rather watch your movies inside, the enormous screening room should do the trick. It’s got room for 40 people and a badass James Bond art installation on the back wall. 13 
In between movies you can stretch your legs at the bowling alley. There are four lanes, so you can also have a Big Lebowski – themed party if you want. 14 
If you do have a party, you don’t need to add BYOB to the invitation because there’s a fully-stocked wine room. 15 
Is it a kids party? Sure, there’s a candy wall for that. Advertisement Advertisement 16 
Of course you’ll need some relaxation after 20 kids on a sugar high run all over the house. That’s what the spa room is for. 17 
Or you can just sweat it out in the fully-equipped home gym. 18 
Even the pillows are expensive seeing as they were made by Hermès. 19 
And finally, the 85-foot glass-tiled infinity pool really ties the whole “cozy” atmosphere together. 20 
According to the builder, luxury developer Bruce Makowsky, “This home was curated for the ultimate billionaire who wants the best of everything that exists in life. Until now, the ultra-luxury market was void of homes that even came close to matching the level of mega-yachts and private jets that billionaires spend millions of dollars on every year.” 
Finally, the billionaires have the perfect outrageously expensive home to go with all of their outrageously expensive toys. 
Related Video: Sharks are suckers for rich people on yachts, who knew? Advertisement
